p: Data related to the yield of essential oil and mortality of S. zeamais were subjected to analysis of variance (ANOVA) and regression analysis by surface response as a function of hydrodistillation time, ultrasound time and drying temperature. The analytical curve for quantification of linalool and estragole were subjected to ANOVA and regression analysis. The graphs were plotted using the SigmaPlot 12.5 software (Systat Software, San Jose, CA, USA). All statistical tests were performed considering a confidence level of 95% by Statistica 12.0 software (StatSoft Corp., Tulsa, OK, USA).
